Content.Text:
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>!  You came to watch my show?
That makes me so happy!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, what is it?
Give Michelle the pink diamond.
Don't give it to her.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um... <MYNAME>, sorry!
<PAGE>
There isn't much time until the show,
so would you mind leaving the restaurant
for now? Thanks!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Oh, is that... a pink diamond?!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fabulous! <MYNAME>, thank you! But...
why?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You're kidding! So you overheard me
talking?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
If you caught what I was saying, I guess
that means you saw my true character.
<PAGE>
Men are so easy to win over just by
being cutesy. It's your own fault for
falling for it!
<PAGE>
Anyway, what do you plan to do? You're
not going to tell everyone in town,
are you?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Even if you say you like me, if you know
my true character, surely you must...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Humph... So what's your angle then?
I'll accept you no matter what!
Return what I gave you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
Wow, you really are a softhearted one,
aren't you?
<PAGE>
All right then. Let's continue this
conversation after the show.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Well let me tell you: it hasn't even
crossed my mind that I've done anything
wrong here.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
So that pink diamond I got today?
There's no way I'm giving it back.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You really like me? Even knowing what I
said?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Good grief. You really are too good
natured... what a fool!
<PAGE>
A real fool...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Ah, I'm hungry!
<PAGE>
Now that I think about it, I haven't had
anything to eat yet.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>! Go and make some super
delicious sweets for me, will ya!
<PAGE>
And hurry! Hey, we can eat them
together!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tee-hee. What I already received is now
mine. End of discussion.
<PAGE>
So sorry.<RED>∀</RED> The show's about
to start, so this conversation is over.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa, he really went home. I thought
he was going to put up more of a fight
than that.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
...This is all a bit hard to take in.
I have never seen such an easy mark
before.
<PAGE>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I could get used to people
like you!
